The home also features a fully functioning engineered septic system and proper drinking water system. The two loft bedrooms provide some privacy, while the kitchen living area overlook the lake and are a great headquarter for enjoying lakefront living!Seasonal access by road, and year round access by boat or snow machine, this home away from home is ready for your family event.
